info.name: 03 - E-commerce API Testing
info.description: This comprehensive collection demonstrates complete e-commerce API testing using FakeStore API. It showcases end-to-end testing of a realistic online store, covering products, shopping carts, user management, and authentication workflows. The collection includes advanced features like dynamic data generation, random testing, and complete CRUD operations across multiple resource types.

request.description:
#### 1\. Get All Products

- Retrieves complete product catalog
    
- Validates response array structure
    
- Tests nested rating object (rate, count)
    
- Verifies all required fields (id, title, price, description, category, image, rating)
    
- Stores product ID for subsequent tests
    
- Logs total product count

#### 3\. Get Limited Products

- Demonstrates limit query parameter (`?limit=5`)
    
- Validates response contains exactly 5 products
    
- Tests pagination control
    
- Confirms query parameter functionality

item.description:
### ðŸ“¦ Products (10 Requests)

Complete product management testing with CRUD operations, filtering, and sorting.

#### 1\. Get All Products

- Retrieves complete product catalog
    
- Validates response array structure
    
- Tests nested rating object (rate, count)
    
- Verifies all required fields (id, title, price, description, category, image, rating)
    
- Stores product ID for subsequent tests
    
- Logs total product count
    

#### 2\. Get Single Product

- Retrieves specific product by ID
    
- Uses stored product ID from previous request
    
- Validates price is a positive number
    
- Tests complete product structure
    
- Logs product name and price
    

#### 3\. Get Limited Products

- Demonstrates limit query parameter (`?limit=5`)
    
- Validates response contains exactly 5 products
    
- Tests pagination control
    
- Confirms query parameter functionality
    

#### 4\. Get Sorted Products

- Tests sort query parameter (`?sort=desc`)
    
- Validates descending order by ID
    
- Implements custom sort validation logic
    
- Confirms sorting functionality works correctly
    

#### 5\. Get Product Categories

- Retrieves all available categories
    
- Validates array response
    
- Stores first category for filtering tests
    
- Logs all categories to console
    

#### 6\. Get Products by Category

- Filters products by specific category
    
- Uses stored category from previous request
    
- Validates all returned products match the category
    
- Tests dynamic path parameters
    

#### 7\. Add New Product

- Creates new product with custom data
    
- Validates 201 Created status
    
- Stores new product ID and price
    
- Tests all required product fields
    

#### 8\. Update New Product (PUT)

- Performs full product update
    
- Changes product price
    
- Validates price change occurred
    
- Tests complete resource replacement
    

#### 9\. Update Product Price (PATCH)

- Demonstrates partial update
    
- Updates only price field
    
- Validates other fields remain unchanged
    
- Shows PATCH vs PUT difference
    

#### 10\. Delete Product

- Removes product by ID
    
- Validates 200 status code
    
- Confirms empty response body
    
- Tests cleanup operations

item.description:
### ðŸ›’ Carts (6 Requests)

Shopping cart management with dynamic data generation and random testing.

#### 1\. Get All Carts

- Retrieves all shopping carts
    
- Validates nested products array
    
- Tests product structure (productId, quantity)
    
- Stores cart count for random selection
    
- Saves first cart ID
    

#### 2\. Get First Cart

- Retrieves specific cart (ID: 1)
    
- Validates cart belongs to user ID 1
    
- Counts total items in cart
    
- Tests nested product validation
    

#### 3\. Get Random User Cart

- **Advanced Feature**: Selects random cart
    
- Uses pre-request script to generate random ID
    
- Demonstrates dynamic test data selection
    
- Validates random cart structure
    

#### 4\. Add Cart

- Creates new cart with dynamic data
    
- Generates current timestamp automatically
    
- Creates random product ID (1-10)
    
- Creates random quantity (1-10)
    
- Stores created cart ID
    

#### 5\. Update Cart

- Updates existing cart with new data
    
- Uses dynamic date, product ID, and quantity
    
- Validates partial update functionality
    
- Tests cart modification
    

#### 6\. Delete Cart

- Removes cart by ID
    
- Validates null response
    
- Tests successful deletion
    
- Cleans up test data

request.description:
#### 1\. Get All Users

- Retrieves all users
    
- Validates complex nested structure:
    
    - Address object with geolocation
        
    - Name object with firstname/lastname
        
- Tests email format with regex
    
- Validates phone number presence
    
- Stores first user ID

item.description:
### ðŸ‘¥ Users (5 Requests)

User management with complex nested objects and authentication.

#### 1\. Get All Users

- Retrieves all users
    
- Validates complex nested structure:
    
    - Address object with geolocation
        
    - Name object with firstname/lastname
        
- Tests email format with regex
    
- Validates phone number presence
    
- Stores first user ID
    

#### 2\. Get First User

- Retrieves specific user (ID: 1)
    
- Validates complete user profile
    
- Tests all nested objects
    
- Confirms user ID is 1
    

#### 3\. Add User

- Creates new user account
    
- Uses Postman's dynamic variables:
    
    - `{{$randomUserName}}`
        
    - `{{$randomEmail}}`
        
    - `{{$randomPassword}}`
        
- Validates 201 Created status
    
- Stores new user ID
    

#### 4\. Update User

- Updates user information
    
- Generates new random credentials
    
- Tests PATCH functionality
    
- Validates user modification
    

#### 5\. Delete User

- Removes user account
    
- Validates null response
    
- Tests successful deletion
    
- Cleans up test user

#### 1\. Authentication

- Tests login endpoint
    
- Uses valid credentials (mor_2314 / 83r5^_)
    
- Validates token generation
    
- Stores authentication token for future use
    
- Tests 201 Created response
